title: Arthur - British Hero Character Voice Pack
description: 1865 files of +900 unique phrases of a British male hero for FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games and more.
longDescription:
[ REAL HUMAN VOICE ACTORS - NO AI USE ALLOWED ]


Audio Preview | List of Phrases


This pack is part of our Hero Characters Bundle!


This British male hero voice pack, spoken by a native British voice actor, covers everything you need for your next project.

He can also be used as an NPC character.

It can be used for games such as FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games, and more.

It can also be used for animation, videos, etc.

These unique royalty-free phrases were carefully mixed and mastered to match your project.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 1865 files of +900 unique phrases.
  • Native British/English accent.
  • The pack is divided into categories for easy access.
  • Top-quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.


CATEGORIES:


  • Positive-Confirm
  • Negative-Refuse
  • Can't
  • Threats-Warning
  • Greetings
  • Goodbyes
  • Questions
  • Single Word
  • Phrases
  • State
  • Requesting Help
  • Offering Help
  • Direction
  • Commands
  • Numbers
  • Time
  • Need
  • Trading
  • Curses
  • Fighter
  • Archer
  • Elf-Knight
  • Vocal Sounds
